entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 90
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR, HOT
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
